tourBios.carHigh: Made nine Champions Tour starts in 2008, six through open-qualifying. Best finish was a T27 at the SAS Championship in his North Carolina hometown. Also made several appearances on the Sunbelt Seniors Tour in 2008 and won the Yellowhammer Open. Played in 13 events in 2007 and finished third at the 3M Championship, where he earned a check for $115,500. Successfully attended the Champions Tour Q-School in both 2006 and 2007. Has also played several events on the Sunbelt Senior Tour in the southeast since turning pro in 2005 as well as numerous other mini-tours, including the Tarheel Tour, Atlantic Coast Pro Golf Tour and the Carolinas Pro Golf Tour. Is a self-taught player. Graduate of Atlantic Christian College and is a former North Carolina Mid-Am champion.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA TOUR Champions was T3rd in 2007 at the 3M Championship.
